definition[0]: a group of people and animals who travel to different places performing skilful tricks as entertainment
note[0]: circus ring (=a large circular area where tricks are performed)
definition[1]: a situation in which there is too much excitement or noise
example[0]: The first day of school is always such a circus.
example[1]: The trial has turned into a media circus.
definition[2]: a round open area where several streets join together, often used in place names
definition[3]: a place in ancient Rome where fights, races etc took place, with seats built in a circle
